===  ===

If a bug report '''has''' system information, it will appear as attachments in a comment.

<nowiki>[[File:Comment.png||width=750]]</nowiki>

;) The original reporter can '''gather''' missing system information by entering, into the Terminal application, the following line:
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| `apport-collect [BUG-NUMBER]`
|}
